Home.title: Home
Home.invite: Check out our examples of typography and colors

registerErrors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
registerErrors.passwordInvalid: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include an uppercase letter, a number, and a special character.
registerErrors.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

Library.title: Library
Library.description-boom: A leading art and design platform from the United Kingdom that offers news, inspiration, insights, and advice from the creative industry.
Library.description-creative: Book by Tom Kelley and David Kelley, founder of IDEO. It discusses creativity as essential for success.
Library.description-magazine: A subscription-based magazine covering topics like literature, politics, music, and fashion. Essential foundations for creatives.
Library.description-muz: Discover the best inspirations for visual arts and photography. Also includes expert articles on design from around the world.

Profile.title: Profile
Profile.description: This is a simple profile page. You can add your personal information here.

Feedback.motivation: 'Our work is sometimes easier to start when we ask ourselves what’s wrong!'

LimitedNarrative.title: Limited Narrative
LimitedNarrative.description: The idea here is to exercise how much we can create with so little. Write a narrative with just eight words about an unrequited romance.
LimitedNarrative.alertDescription: Fill in all the words to continue.

steps.title: create lightly
steps.description: Receive daily suggestions for creative exercises and content to fuel and stimulate your creativity.

steps.title: be consistent
steps.description: Make creativity a habit with small daily moments dedicated to reflecting, exploring and developing.

steps.title: exchange experiences
steps.description: Share your ideas and feedback in a welcoming community that makes you feel at home.

Exercises.title: Exercises
Exercises.subtitle: What creative universe will we explore today?
